content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<IReadOnlyCollection<IXunitTestCase>> CreateTestCasesForDataRow(ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions discoveryOptions, IXunitTestMethod testMethod, ITheoryAttribute theoryAttribute, ITheoryDataRow dataRow, object?[] testMethodArguments)

Protected Overridable Function CreateTestCasesForDataRow(discoveryOptions As ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions, testMethod As IXunitTestMethod, theoryAttribute As ITheoryAttribute, dataRow As ITheoryDataRow, testMethodArguments As Object()) As ValueTask(Of IReadOnlyCollection(Of IXunitTestCase))

parameters.description: The discovery options to be used.
The test method the test cases belong to.
The theory attribute attached to the test method.
The arguments for the test method.

children.summary: Creates test cases for a single row of data. By default, returns a single instance of with the data row inside of it.

content.value: protected virtual ValueTask<IReadOnlyCollection<IXunitTestCase>> CreateTestCasesForTheory(ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions discoveryOptions, IXunitTestMethod testMethod, ITheoryAttribute theoryAttribute)

Protected Overridable Function CreateTestCasesForTheory(discoveryOptions As ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions, testMethod As IXunitTestMethod, theoryAttribute As ITheoryAttribute) As ValueTask(Of IReadOnlyCollection(Of IXunitTestCase))

parameters.description: The discovery options to be used.
The test method the test cases belong to.
The theory attribute attached to the test method.

children.summary: Creates test cases for the entire theory. This is used when one or more of the theory data items are not serializable, or if the user has requested to skip theory pre-enumeration, or if the user has requested the entire theory be skipped. By default, returns a single instance of (which performs the data discovery at runtime, for non-skipped theories) or (for skipped theories).

content.value: public virtual ValueTask<IReadOnlyCollection<IXunitTestCase>> Discover(ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions discoveryOptions, IXunitTestMethod testMethod, IFactAttribute factAttribute)

Public Overridable Function Discover(discoveryOptions As ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions, testMethod As IXunitTestMethod, factAttribute As IFactAttribute) As ValueTask(Of IReadOnlyCollection(Of IXunitTestCase))

parameters.description: The discovery options to be used.
The test method the test cases belong to.
The theory attribute attached to the test method.

return.description: Returns zero or more test cases represented by the test method.

children.remarks:
This method performs the following steps:

  • If the theory attribute is marked with Skip, or pre-enumeration is off, or any of the test data is non serializable, returns the result of ;
  • If there is no theory data, returns a single test case of with the error in it;
  • Otherwise, it returns one test case per data row, created by calling .
children.summary: Discover test cases from a test method.

summary: Implementation of that supports finding test cases on methods decorated with .
